summary: Bickering siblings are reunited at their Texas home as their father lies on his deathbed.
cast: Beau Bridges|Beverly D'Angelo|Tess Harper|Judge Reinhold|Amy Wright|Patrika Darbo|Bert Remsen|Molly McClure|Keith Carradine|Newell Alexander|Emily Bridges|Carolyn Brooks|Schuyler Fisk|Justin Smith|Katherine A. Torn|Sandra Will
title: Papá se muere. ¿Quién tiene la herencia?
